rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan area combining living and dining, designed in a Kerala-style motif with local woodwork and tiled flooring. Vastu principles ensure proper alignment of seating and entrance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area, featuring modern amenities with traditional Kerala design accents. Placement adheres to Vastu guidelines for functional flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxury master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and large windows ensuring natural light, positioned in the east as per Vastu for positivity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with Kerala-style interiors and privacy features; located adjacent to master bedroom ensuring ease of access while maintaining separation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom designed for functionality and comfort, integrated with both master and guest bedrooms; includes Vastu compliant placement of fixtures.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Luxury private gym area fitted with modern equipment, designed to promote wellness. Positioned in the north-east sector according to Vastu principles for energy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility space for laundry and storage, designed in a Kerala style with appropriate ventilation.

Private gym placed in the north-east sector per Vastu guidelines.
